mapping.sql: select pc.province_name ProvinceName, '%%Y-%%M-%%D' as ReportDate, t.china_name TemplateName, (CASE t.Vendor WHEN 'ZY0801' THEN '爱立信' WHEN 'ZY0802' THEN '大唐' WHEN 'ZY0803' THEN '烽火' WHEN 'ZY0804' THEN '中兴' WHEN 'ZY0805' THEN '普天' WHEN 'ZY0806' THEN '上海贝尔' WHEN 'ZY0807' THEN '诺西' WHEN 'ZY0808' THEN '华为' WHEN 'ZY0810' THEN '阿朗' WHEN 'ZY0000' THEN '公共' END) VendorId, 0 VersionId, t.ne_type NeLevel, '' Remark from mod_app_template t left join mod_app_template_group tg on t.group_id = tg.id left join CFG_CITY cc on tg.city_id = cc.city_id left join CFG_PROVINCE_CITY pc on cc.city_name = pc.city_name
select '' FieldChName, '1' OrderType from mod_app_template t
select '' Field, '' FieldChName, '1' OrderType from mod_app_template t

select '' Field,'' FieldChName,'' ConditionOp,'' Value,'' ColoArgb from mod_app_template t
